title: Fire vortex
data:
***Version [0.17](/0.17 "0.17")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all vortices, see [list of vortices](/List_of_vortices "List of vortices").*

| fire vortex v [![Fire vortex.png](/images/8/8a/Fire_vortex.png)](/File:Fire_vortex.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |

| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                 | [rF+++](/Fire "Fire") [rElec](/Electricity "Electricity") [rPois+++](/Poison "Poison") [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation") [rMiasma](/Miasma "Miasma") [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment") [rSticky](/Sticky_Flame "Sticky Flame") |

|   |                            |
| - | -------------------------- |
|   | A swirling cloud of flame. |

## Useful Info

**Fire vortices** are swirling clusters of flame that are created by the [Fire Storm](/Fire_Storm "Fire Storm") spell. Their melee attack deals 15-24 [fire](/Fire "Fire") damage that ignores half of your [AC](/AC "AC"), but also hurts themselves for 10 damage. They move around fast, but randomly. Unless encountered early, fire vortices are mainly significant as blockers.

Fire vortices can also rarely appear by themselves in the [Volcano](/Volcano "Volcano") and some [vaults](/Vault "Vault"). They can also be created by fire [miscasts](/Miscast "Miscast").

From CrawlWiki

Version 0.17: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all vortices, see list of vortices.

fire vortex v 
HP 19-40
HD 10
XP 0
Speed 15
AC 0
EV 5
Will Immune
Attack1 0 (hit: pure fire)


Resistances rF+++
rElec
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
rSticky
Vulnerabilities Cold
Habitat Land
Intelligence Brainless
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Non-living
Size Large
Type fire vortex, fire vortex
Flags Flying
Unbreathing
Confused
Insubstantial
No experience gain
Conjured
A swirling cloud of flame.

Useful Info

Fire vortices are swirling clusters of flame that are created by the Fire Storm spell. Their melee attack deals 15-24 fire damage that ignores half of your AC, but also hurts themselves for 10 damage. They move around fast, but randomly. Unless encountered early, fire vortices are mainly significant as blockers.

Fire vortices can also rarely appear by themselves in the Volcano and some vaults. They can also be created by fire miscasts.
